about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello, my name is Juan Cruz Dauberte and I am 21 years old. I am passionate about technology, especially software and challenges. I am  finishing my  Degree in IT Analyst at the National University of San Antonio de Areco (UNSAdA). In the other hand, I am studying at the digital academy  call Coderhouse as a Fullstack MERN Web Developer. I specialize in software development. On the Frontend, I apply my knowledge to personal projects using technologies such as TypeScript, JavaScript, and React. On the Backend, I focus on building robust and scalable solutions with Node.js, Express.js, and Mongoose. I have experience working with both relational and non-relational database management systems, including MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. Iâ€™m eager to contribute to initiatives that support both my professional and personal growth while generating a positive impact within the organization.
about.descriptionBesides: I really enjoy sports and I'm passionate about physical activities. I love playing football with my friends, going to the gym, and playing padel. In my free time, I enjoy programming and coming up with ideas for new challenges and projects. Thank you very much for your time!
